title: Evaluating layer contributions and salt coating effects on mask performance
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27644-27656
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04581E, Paper

Sumin Han, Caitlyn Maliksi, Euna Oh, Surjith Kumaran, Kyu Hyoung Lee, Dae-Hong Ko, Hyo-Jick Choi
A stack of salt-coated spunbond fabrics can significantly enhance filtration performance when used as a cover over a mask or as the outermost layer.
